statements: UPDATE fitness_feedback SET rating = 5 WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE fitness_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great class!' WHERE member_id = 101 AND class_id = 201;
UPDATE fitness_feedback SET feedback_text='Great class!', rating=5 WHERE feedback_id=1;
UPDATE fitness_feedback SET rating=4, feedback_text='Could be improved' WHERE class_id=3 AND member_id=5;

UPDATE member_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great class, highly recommended!', rating = 5 WHERE class_id = 'f3eec516-8b67-4dcf-9df7-0b1c4087a5d7' AND member_id = 'e842f5a1-6ddb-42c8-9517-338832fb6d50'
